abstract: Guy Lofalk, court-appointed administrator overseeing voluntary reorganization at Saab, will recommend halt to process, removing last barrier to company's collapse.
snippet: Saab Automobile’s appears closer to collapse, with Chinese investors getting cold feet and a court-appointed administrator recommending that the company’s reorganization process be halted.
lead_paragraph: Saab Automobile’s appears closer to collapse, with Chinese investors getting cold feet and a court-appointed administrator recommending that the company’s reorganization process be halted.

headline.main: Saab's Hopes Fade as Chinese Investors Lose Interest
headline.print_headline: Saab’s Reorganization Falters as Investors Lose Interest
